text: glorious Istanbul that wonderful mix of

decades old it first applied for the

speeding up
for a country to join the European Union
it has to satisfy 35 policy areas
so-called chapters from energy to human
rights fisheries to foreign policy since
Turkey became an EU candidate in 2005
it's fulfilled only one of them science
and research others a way off completion
for years it's virtually stalled looks
beautiful doesn't it but some EU states

million people and because it's a Muslim

would veto accession until turkey

the breakaway Turkish Republic of

opinion isn't in Turkey's favor

country media outlets have been taken
over
critics prosecuted violent conflict with

to EU accession
so even if turkey gets visa-free travel
to the EU Schengen zone that's not
really a move towards Europe countries
from Peru to South Korea have that to
Turkey's voyage to the EU is an

perhaps this country might simply miss
